name: Paris Bistro Sauce
description: Ooh la la! Instant flavour bursting with garlic and kissed by parsley. Dip, spoon, drizzle, or spread on your favourite recipes: potatoes, pasta, rice, chicken, fish, beef, veggies, toasted baguetteâ€¦and yes, you can cook with it too!
preparation: Mix Paris Bistro with water. Let stand 5 minutes. Stir in olive oil.
